SELECT bs.batch_nb, mm.name AS material_name, mk.id, mk.order_number, mk.factory_code as factory_code, mk.ware_code, mk.area_code, mk.bin_code, mk.material_code, mk.quantity, mk.move_type, mk.sscc_number, mk.cell, mk.type, mk.status, mk.create_by, mk.update_by, mk.create_time, mk.update_time FROM material_kanban mk LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM bi_stock where delete_flag = '0') bs ON mk.sscc_number = bs.sscc_number LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from md_material where delete_flag = '0') mm ON mk.material_code = mm.code WHERE mk.delete_flag = 0 and (mk.status = 3 or mk.status = 4) and mk.ware_code like concat('%', #{wareCode}, '%')

SELECT mm.name AS material_name, mk.id, mk.order_number, mk.factory_code as factory_code, mk.ware_code, mk.area_code, mk.bin_code, mk.material_code, mk.quantity, mk.move_type, mk.sscc_number, mk.cell, mk.type, mk.status, mk.create_by, mk.update_by, mk.create_time, mk.update_time FROM material_kanban mk LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from md_material where delete_flag = '0') mm ON mk.material_code = mm.code WHERE mk.delete_flag = 0 and mk.status != -1 and mk.status != 7 and mk.sscc_number like concat('%', #{ssccNb}, '%') limit 1 for update

SELECT bs.batch_nb, mm.name AS material_name, mk.id, mk.order_number, mk.factory_code as factory_code, mk.ware_code, mk.area_code, mk.bin_code, mk.material_code, mk.quantity, mk.move_type, mk.sscc_number, mk.cell, mk.type, mk.status, mk.create_by, mk.update_by, mk.create_time, mk.update_time FROM material_kanban mk LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM bi_stock where delete_flag = '0') bs ON mk.sscc_number = bs.sscc_number LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from md_material where delete_flag = '0') mm ON mk.material_code = mm.code WHERE mk.delete_flag = 0 and mk.status = 1 and mk.ware_code like concat('%', #{wareCode}, '%') and mk.sscc_number not in (select sscc_nb from ware_shift where delete_flag = 0 and status = 1)
